member.name: DXGI_MULTIPLANE_OVERLAY_YCbCr_FLAGS.DXGI_MULTIPLANE_OVERLAY_YCbCr_FLAG_NOMINAL_RANGE
member.summary: Specifies nominal range YCbCr, which isn't an absolute color space, but a way of encoding RGB info.

member.name: DXGI_MULTIPLANE_OVERLAY_YCbCr_FLAGS.DXGI_MULTIPLANE_OVERLAY_YCbCr_FLAG_BT709
member.summary: Specifies BT.709, which standardizes the format of high-definition television and has 16:9 (widescreen) aspect ratio.

member.name: DXGI_MULTIPLANE_OVERLAY_YCbCr_FLAGS.DXGI_MULTIPLANE_OVERLAY_YCbCr_FLAG_xvYCC
member.summary: Specifies xvYCC or extended-gamut YCC (also x.v.Color) color space that can be used in the video electronics of television sets to support a gamut 1.8 times as large as that of the sRGB color space.
